attributes.action: Stop the Development of 600 acres of Green Belt land in Barthomley and Weston.
attributes.additional_details:
We the people, ask you our voted leaders, to stop the plundering by Cheshire East of over 600 acres of Green Belt Land in area's of Barthomley and Weston.

Under current policies local and NPPF there is no way the Barthomley and Weston proposal can legally proceed.

With hundreds of acres of brownfield sites and green gap land which are more centrally located to the town of Crewe. This out of Town development could increase private vehicle use by 8000 cars, thus increasing CO2 emissions which should be taken to account on this irresponsible proposal.

Cheshire East Council should be brought to task, as they are wasting tax payers monies on a proposal which is currently illegal.
